title: New ninja?
body:
We need a new ninja champion, preferably with Zed's order of the shadows...?  

Maybe he throws ninja stars and is an assassin.. well think about it please

replies.body: Got 2 options there. Zed. Or imagine Talon as a ninja. Pick 1.

yeah he throws ninja stars and is an assassin, who's with zed's order of the shadow, who should also be able to switch with a shadow and slash all around him


m8.
